title: Invalid base64 when viewing dead job
body:
Ruby version: 3.2.3
Rails version: 7.1.3.2
Sidekiq / Pro / Enterprise version(s):
sidekiq 7.2.2
sidekiq-pro 7.2.0

![image](https://github.com/sidekiq/sidekiq/assets/5264240/406abade-cd7a-4d1c-aa81-0717455b7e71)

